comment:
Good lord this is weird. Good weird though. 
I love Anchor Steam. Hands down my favorite beer. So I’m partially blinded and biased by that fact. 
Distilled from their annual Christmas offering which has become a tradition for me and my buddies (they have magnums FYI,) it has the best angle ever... the spirit of Christmas past. 

This needs a chunk of ice. I love it with a chunk of ice. They truly are doing the Lord’s work.
